jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Are you interested in building products that build on top of a massive user base and still shoot for the stars? Do you enjoy iterative software development and quickly building products with the ability to see the real-time impact of your contribution? Here is an opportunity to work with the Growth Platforms team of the fastest-growing startup in the sub-continent with 2 million+ drivers, 300k merchants and 6600x total order volume growth in 3 years. Our team is responsible for building growth tools covering experimentation, discovery, personalization, and promotions at scale across 20+ products.

You get to work with an insanely driven and proud team of engineers who work across Transport, Food Delivery, C2C logistics, and Mobile Payments space at a really interesting combination of scale and complexity.  Did we mention that you get to know about and travel to countries across South East Asia as well? :)

What We Do:
- Experiment, A/B test, and iterate closely with business and creative teams based on data
- Carefully document, instrument, and QA our in-app clickstream events and logging
- Own product discovery for the entire Home Screen of Gojek
- Coordinate with cross-functional teams (Product, DevOps, UX, Data Science, Data Engineering, Research, QA, etc.) to plan and deliver the best Platform app in Southeast Asia!

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Design, build and improve the mobile experiences for one of the world's fastest growing mobile apps
  • Partner with the product management team to define and execute the feature roadmap
  • Coordinate with cross functional teams (Backend, DevOps, Design etc.) on planning and execution
  • Proactively manage stakeholders communication related to deliverables, risks, changes and dependencies
  • Provide technology leadership to the team and foster engineering excellence
  • Communicate, collaborate and work effectively across cross functional teams in a global environment

• 4+ years of experience with Android development
  • Proficient in Kotlin
  • Strong understanding of Android Apps architecture and implementation
  • Has prior experience building Android SDKs
  • Working experience with popular libraries for networking, async, image loading, etc
  • Well versed with Agile methodologies, TDD and Test Engineering and Automation
  • Willingness to be relocated to Jakarta office (Relocation support will be provided)
